entry.title: Mixed-Integer Linear Programming
entry.content:
Cutting-Planes:

  • 1. Cutting-planes in mixed-integer linear programs: an overview
  • 2. An introduction to Gomory cuts
  • 3. An introduction to MIR Inequalities and Relations between Families of Cuts
  • 4. An introduction to Chvatal-Gomory Cuts
  • 5. An introduction to Cover Inequalities: Part I
entry.summary: Cutting-Planes: 1. Cutting-planes in mixed-integer linear programs: an overview 2. An introduction to Gomory cuts 3. An introduction to MIR Inequalities and Relations between Families of Cuts 4. An introduction to Chvatal-Gomory Cuts 5. An introduction to Cover Inequalities: Part I

entry.title: Mathematical Programming Computation Seminar Series
entry.content:
Shenzhen Research Institute of Big Data and Shenzhen International Center for Industrial and Applied Mathematics are organizing a “Mathematical Programming Computation” seminar series. This series will be held at The Chinese University of Hong Kong, Shenzhen, China. Distinguished speakers are invited to share cutting-edge research in computational, applied aspects of mathematical programming.

Invited speakers:

  • 2023/1/6, Prof. Wei-Kun Chen
  • 2023/1/9, Dr. Fan Zhang
  • 2023/3/6, Xijun Li
  • 2023/3/13, Dr. Timo Berthold
  • 2023/5/8, Prof. Thorsten Koch
  • 2023/5/24, "Zeroth-Order Optimization" workshop
entry.summary: Shenzhen Research Institute of Big Data and Shenzhen International Center for Industrial and Applied Mathematics are organizing a “Mathematical Programming Computation” seminar series. This series will be held at The Chinese University of Hong Kong, Shenzhen, China. Distinguished speakers are invited to share cutting-edge research in computational, applied aspects of mathematical programming.

entry.title: Operations Research
entry.content:
Lectures on Optimization

  • Large-Scale Optimization for Data Science, Princeton
  • Convex Optimization, CMU
  • Optimization Methods for Large-Scale Systems, UCLA
  • Advanced Topics in Convex Optimization, Stanford
  • Convex Analysis and Optimization, MIT

Optimization Books

  • MOS-SIAM Series on Optimization

entry.title: Optimization Implementation
entry.content:
CPLEX

  • Download CPLEX via your academic account
  • Installation
  • Set up CPLEX
  • Documentation

Gurobi

  • Installation
  • Documentation

MOSEK

  • Documentation

CVX

  • Tutorial

NEOS

  • NEOS Server

Benchmarks for Optimization Software

  • Hans D. Mittlemann

Coding Languages

  • C++
  • Python
  • Julia

Coding Style

  • Google Style Guides

Code profiling

  • Use valgrind to generate a file “callgrind.out.x” where x is some number
    • requirement: valgrind
    • valgrind --tool=callgrind [call your code with arguments]
  • Use the pythyon code gprof2dot.py
    • requirement: python, graphviz
    • python gprof2dot.py -s -f callgrind ./callgrind.out.x | dot -Tpdf -o output.pdf

Parallel computing

  • Introduction to Parallel Computing
  • OpenMP Tutorials
  • OpenMP

If you want to compare CPUs, the following link might be helpful.

  • CPU Benchmarks
entry.summary: CPLEX Download CPLEX via your academic account Installation Set up CPLEX Documentation

entry.title: Traveling Salesman/Vehicle Routing Problems
entry.content:
I found the following useful codes for solving traveling salesman problems (TSP) and vehicle routing problems (VRP).

  • Concorde
  • LKH
  • jspirit
  • VRPSolver

I also found some nice VRP websites.

  • CVRPLIB
  • Networking and Emerging Optimization
  • Chair in Logistics and Transportation
  • VRP-REP
  • VEROLOG
  • Thibaut Vidal's website

Here are some excellent and comprehensive books about TSP/VRP.

  • The Vehicle Routing Problem, 2002
  • The Traveling Salesman Problem A Computational Study, 2007
  • Vehicle Routing Problems, Methods and Applications, 2014
entry.summary: I found the following useful codes for solving traveling salesman problems (TSP) and vehicle routing problems (VRP).
